## GO Enrichment
---
R-EnrichTool is based on EnrichR. 

To obtain your associated GO terms and description in a nice table and graph, just paste a Symbol list.



-  <u> As input </u> </br>
Paste a list of <b> Symbols</b> of interest 



- <u> GO Terms </u> </br>
Choose the GO enrichment you want and the number of results to show.
(results are sorted from the most significant p-value to the least)
